entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 22 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the morning. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 22 December 2022
